request.description: Register a new job seeker. Required: email, password, firstName, lastName. Optional: description, skills, gender, dateOfBirth, idNumber, contactNumber, maritalStatus, location, city, country, references, experience, jobCategoryId. Returns user info with profile (no password). A welcome email will be sent to the registered email address. Includes comprehensive validation for ID number (16 digits), age (18+ years), and other fields.
